name: AcuteCoronarySyndromesSNOMEDCT
title: Acute Coronary Syndromes SNOMEDCT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of SNOMED-CT codes is intended to capture a patient with acute coronary syndromes (e.g., acute myocardial infarction, acute coronary thrombosis and unstable angina diagnoses).),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a diagnosis of an acute coronary syndrome (e.g., myocardial infarction).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED-CT codes indicating acute myocardial infarction, acute coronary thrombosis, and unstable angina diagnoses.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes SNOMED-CT codes that do not indicate acute myocardial infarction, acute coronary thrombosis, and unstable angina diagnoses.)
